summary: After a prank goes awry and lands a hospital janitor in a coma, a group of doctors begin dying at the hands of the comatose patient who is extracting revenge through out-of-body experiences.
cast: Arielle Kebbel|Sarah Carter|Stephen Dillane|Andrew Lee Potts|Alex Wyndham|Katie McGrath|Christina Chong|Martin Compston|Michael Jibson|MyAnna Buring|Colin Stinton|Nick Hardin|Michael J. Reynolds|Sarah Wilson|Art Parkinson|Bronagh Taggart|Emmett J Scanlan|Derek Halligan|Mike Calo|Sandra Ni Bhroin|Marcus Valentine|Richard McFerran|Logan Bruce|Megan O'Rawe-Toner|Robert Render
title: Red mist (Freakdog)
